mapper.select: SELECT employee_id, emp_name, PROFIL, birth, gender, emp_tel, emp_mail, emp_addr, job.JOB, dept.DEPTNM, STATUS, start_date, quit_date FROM tbl_employee emp JOIN tbl_job job ON emp.JOB_ID = job.JOB_ID JOIN tbl_department dept ON emp.DEPTID = dept.DEPTID WHERE emp.employee_id=#{employee_id}
